## How to set up a preloader

Pass the argument `preloader = TRUE` to the `dashboardPage()` function.
You can also change the loading duration (2s by default): `duration = 5` for
5 seconds.

<video width="640" height="480" controls style="display: block; margin: 0 auto;">
  <source src="figures/preloader.mp4" type="video/mp4">
</video>

<br>

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(shiny)
library(shinydashboard)
library(shinydashboardPlus)

shinyApp(
  ui = dashboardPage(
    preloader = TRUE,
    header = dashboardHeader(),
    sidebar = dashboardSidebar(),
    body = dashboardBody(),
    title = "DashboardPage"
  ),
  server = function(input, output) { }
)
```
